price: ڕۆژێک (دێت) شایەتی ئەدات لەسەریان زمانیان و دەست و قاچەکانیان بەوکردەوانەی کە کردوویانە
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَشۡهَدُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَلۡسِنَتُهُمۡ وَأَيۡدِيهِمۡ وَأَرۡجُلُهُم بِمَا كَانُواْ يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yawma tashhadu ʿalayhim alsinatuhum wa-aydīhim wa-arjuluhum bimā kānū yaʿmalūna
